title: Sentence Building
markdown_content:
### Sentence Building **Instructions:** Identify the subjects and predicates in each sentence, then rewrite the run-on sentences with proper punctuation. **1. Identify the Subject and Predicate:**
The hungry dog ate the entire bowl of food. **2. Identify the Subject and Predicate:**
The children played in the park until it started to rain. **3. Rewrite the Run-on Sentence:**
The cat chased the mouse it ran under the sofa because it was scared. **4. Rewrite the Run-on Sentence:**
The teacher gave a lecture the students were very attentive. **5. Rewrite the Run-on Sentence:**
The baby cried all night long the parents were exhausted.

answer_key.q1_predicate: ate the entire bowl of food
answer_key.q2_predicate: played in the park until it started to rain
answer_key.q3_rewrite: The cat chased the mouse. It ran under the sofa because it was scared.
answer_key.q4_rewrite: The teacher gave a lecture. The students were very attentive.
answer_key.q5_rewrite: The baby cried all night long. The parents were exhausted.
